summary.overview: This JCL job creates a backup of card transaction data by copying records from a VSAM dataset to a sequential backup file. The backup is stored as a new generation in a Generation Data Group for data protection and recovery purposes.
business_functions: Read card transaction data from the primary VSAM transaction file
Create a sequential backup copy of all transaction records
Store the backup as a new generation in the backup dataset for historical retention

REPRTEST.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility that performs data management operations including copying and backing up datasets

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Data File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Contains transaction data that serves as the source for backup operations. This file stores all card transaction records that need to be preserved through backup processes.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Transaction Backup File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(+1))
datasource_summary.function: Stores backup copies of transaction data as new generations in a generation data group. Each backup creates a new version with 350-byte fixed-length records containing complete transaction history for recovery purposes.

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["IBM utility that performs data management operations including copying and backing up datasets (IDCAMS) "]
